document:
heat_template_version: 2013-05-23

parameters:
  networkName:
    type: string
    description: 'Network Name'
    label: Network Name
    default: 'VIDEO'
  subnetCIDR:
    type: string
    description: '(Required)'
    label: Subnet cidr
    default: '10.0.1.0/24'
  subnetDefGwIp:
    type: string
    description: 'Default Gateway IP address'
    label: Defautlt Gateway
    default: '10.0.1.1'

parameter_groups:
    - { label: network, parameters: [networkName] }
    - { label: subnet, parameters: [subnetCIDR, subnetDefGwIp] }
resources:
  video-net:
    type: OS::Neutron::Net
    properties:
      name: { get_param: networkName }  # Network Name

  # network    - The ID of the attached network.
  # ip_version - The IP version, which is 4 or 6.
  # prefixlen  - Prefix length for subnet allocation from subnet pool.
  # cidr       - The CIDR.
  # ipv6_address_mode - IPv6 address mode.
  # ipv6_ra_mode - IPv6 RA (Router Advertisement) mode.
  # subnetpool - The name or ID of the subnet pool.
  # enable_dhcp - Set to true if DHCP is enabled and false if DHCP is disabled.
  # gateway_ip - The gateway IP address. Set to any of [ null | ~ | "" ] to create/update a subnet without a gateway. If omitted when creation, neutron will assign the first free IP address within the subnet to the gateway automatically. If remove this from template when update, the old gateway IP address will be detached.
  # tenant_id  - The ID of the tenant who owns the network. Only administrative users can specify a tenant ID other than their own.
  # allocation_pools - The start and end addresses for the allocation pools.
  # dns_nameservers - A specified set of DNS name servers to be used.
  # host_routes - A list of host route dictionaries for the subnet.
  # value_specs - Extra parameters to include in the request.
  OS-Neutron-Subnet:
    type: OS::Neutron::Subnet
    properties:
      name: OS-Neutron-Subnet
      network: { get_resource: video-net }  # OS::Neutron::Net
      ip_version: 4              # allowed values: 4, 6
      cidr: { get_param: subnetCIDR }  # (Required)
      enable_dhcp: True 
      gateway_ip: { get_param: subnetDefGwIp }  # Default Gateway IP address



outputs:
  blueprint_url:
    description: Blueprint Origin URL
    value:  https://10.220.216.92:8443/landscaper/view/projects?open=ucdpadmin_00000000_0000_0000_0000_000000000002-OrionContent/Internal-Team/net_video.yml
  network-id:
    description: the network of the id just created
    value: { get_attr: [ video-net, show, id] }
name: net_video
